segments.text: Good morning . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I want to post this letter . Can you tell me what the postage is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I must weigh it . Do you want to send it by ordinary or registered mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want this letter registered . There is something valuable inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , you'd better have it registered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . Would you mind telling me the postage now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Seven dollars and fifty cents in all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Here are your receipt and your change .
segments.speaker: S1
